duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for maintaining adequate inventory levels and distributing implants and surgical supplies to operating rooms as per request.
Receive, document, and dispense implants to the surgical team as requested.
Perform inventory counts on loaner implant systems and manage inventory according to pre-determined par levels.
Review operative surgical schedule for implant and supply needs and update communication boards accordingly.
Label, manage, and notify vendor representatives for loaner implants as needed.
Act as a resource person for circulating nurses regarding implants and surgical supplies.
